mapper.insert: insert into st_user_peas_his( user_id, peas_type, peas_balance, register_number, accept_person, accept_date ) values ( #{userId}, #{peasType}, #{peasBalance}, #{registerNumber}, #{acceptPerson}, #{acceptDate} )
mapper.select: select peas_id, user_id, peas_type, peas_balance, register_number, accept_person, accept_date from st_user_peas_his where user_id =#{userId}
